Question
========

According to CBS, the average size of jobs among married women in the Netherlands was 0.7 FTE (full-time equivalent). The distribution of this size is normally distributed with a standard deviation of 0.3 fte. Suppose you take a random sample among 36 married women, what is the expected value of the sample mean?

Answerlist
----------

* 0.3 fte
* 0.4 fte
* 0.7 fte
* 1.0 fte

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 0.3 FTE: Incorrect
* 0.4 FTE: Incorrect
* 0.7 FTE: Correct
* 1.0 FTE: Incorrect
